official_title: To authorize farmers in the State of Louisiana to operate certain commercial motor vehicles anywhere in the State without a commercial drivers license until January 1, 2006.

summary.text: Authorizes an operator of a farm vehicle to operate without a commercial driver's license anywhere in the State of Louisiana until January 1, 2006.

titles.title: To authorize farmers in the State of Louisiana to operate certain commercial motor vehicles anywhere in the State without a commercial drivers license until January 1, 2006.
